name: cerebrum-ai-monorepo
description: Cerebrum AI Trading Platform - Unified Cloudflare Worker monorepo with Core API, Telegram Bot, and web interfaces

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/db run build && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/shared run build && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/telegram-bot run build && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/web run build && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/worker run build
scripts.test:ci: pnpm run lint && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run test && pnpm run security:audit
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/db run lint && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/shared run lint && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/telegram-bot run lint && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/web run lint && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/worker run lint
scripts.format: pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/db run format && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/shared run format && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/telegram-bot run format && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/web run format && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/worker run format
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/db run typecheck && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/shared run typecheck && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/telegram-bot run typecheck && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/web run typecheck && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/worker run typecheck
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/db run clean && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/shared run clean && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/telegram-bot run clean && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/web run clean && pnpm --filter @celebrum-ai/worker run clean
scripts.security:check: pnpm run security:audit && pnpm run security:scan

author: Cerebrum AI Team
